## üîß Technical Stack

### Current Architecture
- **Backend:** Rust + Node.js (NAPI bindings)
- **Database:** PostgreSQL
- **Caching:** None (‚ùå needs Redis)
- **Monitoring:** Partial (‚ö†Ô∏è needs Prometheus + Grafana)
- **GPU:** CUDA available but underutilized

### Target Architecture (Post-Optimization)
- **Backend:** Rust + Node.js
- **Database:** PostgreSQL + TimescaleDB (for time-series)
- **Caching:** Redis cluster (with 85% hit rate)
- **Monitoring:** Prometheus + Grafana + Loki
- **GPU:** Fully utilized with batch processing
- **Real-time:** WebSocket server for alerts
